body: LOL hell no my niggers. kill all cucks

EITHER POST THE WHOLE DAMN THING OR NOTHING AT ALL YOU GREEDY PRICK! no one wants to join your patreon and you posting random parts of a story isn't going to change that. All it's going to do is just piss people off. If you MUST post parts of a story that isn't done DO IT IN ORDER!!! don't just go "which parts look good enough to get me a new patreon member" go in order from the first page to the last page up until it's fully released.
